Sentence.sentence: Working-class children are happier, more independent, complain less and are closer to family members, Ms.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: American parents want similar things for their children, the Pew report and past research have found: for them to be healthy and happy, honest and ethical, caring and compassionate.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The survey shows us that today's teens are affectionate, sensible and far happier than the angry and tortured souls that have been painted for us by stereotypes.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Students do not merely benefit while at university; studies show- they go on to be healthier and happier than non-graduates, and also far more likely to vote.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Few political libraries are without a copy of Nudge: Improving Decisions About Health, Wealth and Happiness, by Richard Thaler and Cass Sunstein.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Those who enjoy total freedom may not find themselves happy.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: People often assume that more money will make them happier.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He was happy to see the return of the do-it-yourself spirit in America.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Mary is not happy with the ban on pet animals.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But I am not awfully happy with the idea.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Or you can pretend to like things which you are quite happy to do without.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: After outlining the main points she would cover, she assured the audience that she would be happy to answer questions at the end of her presentation
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite unemployment and the lost of her home, Andrea Clark considers herself a blessed and happy woman.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He has been particularly happy about the new equipment because many of the employees have told him how much it has helped them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Schwartz found that while maximizers ended up with better-paying jobs than satisficers on average, they weren't as happy with their decision.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: They could enjoy a happier family life.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And then they change the mood in the music either from sad to happy or the other way around.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: For example, 25% of the working people interviewed described themselves as very happy at work.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: It's likely you prefer to feel happy instead of sad or confident instead of insecure.
Sentence.come: 2016年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Respondents' minds tended to wander more when they felt upset rather than happy.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The researchers found that extended screen time makes young people less happy.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: This suggests that babies of that age can tell the difference between a happy melody and a sad tune.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: TV might make you less happy, but this is not what seems to be driving the recent declines in young people's average happiness.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

means: [人名] 哈皮

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都可表示"有利的，好运的，顺利的"之意
means: favourable ： 普通用词，指预示从良好的结果中能得到明显好处，有利于达到目的。
fortunate ： 指目前已存在的成功或有利情况，或指因好运或机会带来的成功和喜悦。
happy ： 侧重指不是通过某种机会，而是凭借鉴另和选择手段而得到利益与好处。有时也指偶然得到的好处，但强调的是有利的结果。
lucky ： 多指偶然机遇中的有利或幸运情况。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"愉快的，高兴的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: happy, glad, cheerful, joyful, merry, delightful, gay, pleasant, nice, jolly, agreeable
means: happy ： 侧重感到满足、幸福或高兴。
glad ： 最普通用词，语气较弱，表示礼貌的惯用语。指乐于做某事或因某事而感到满足，常表愉快的心情。
cheerful ： 多指因内心的愉快而表现出兴高采烈，是强调而自然的感情流露。
joyful ： 语气较强，强调心情或感情上的欣喜。
merry ： 指精神情绪的暂时高涨，表示欢乐、愉快的心境或情景，侧重充满欢笑声和乐趣。
delightful ： 指能带来强烈的快乐，激起愉快的情感，用于非常愉快的场合。
gay ： 侧重无忧无虑、精神昂扬、充满生命的快乐。
pleasant ： 侧重给人以"赏心悦目"或"愉快的，宜人的"感受。
nice ： 语气较温和，泛指任何愉快或满意的感觉。
jolly ： 通俗用词，多指充满快乐与喜悦的神情。
agreeable ： 指与感受者的愿望、情趣或受好等和谐一致而带来的心情上的快意。

stems_affixes.value_cn: 偶然的,无计划的,随意的,杂乱无章的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hap机会,运气+hazard冒险的事,游戏→运气加游戏→偶然的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 快乐的,幸福的;乐意的;令人满意的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hap机会,运气+y……的→happy有运气的→幸福的
per全部+hap机会,运气+s表复数→全部都是机会,运气[决定]
hap机会,运气+hazard冒险的事,游戏→运气加游戏→偶然的
happy[adj.快乐的,幸福的;乐意的;令人满意的]+ness性质,状态→happiness幸福,幸运
hap机会,运气+en表动词→happen机会来了→发生

Sentence.sentence: A study shows the students who are engaged in after-school activities are happier than those who are not.

Sentence.sentence: Advertisements persuade us that newer is better and that we will be happier with the latest products.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语安徽卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: And today when I look back, I'm so happy because you never know where life will take you.

Sentence.sentence: But it makes me happy think that I'll never have to go to another training session again.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷3 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: By most measurements he was a happy man.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语天津卷 阅读表达 原文

Sentence.sentence: Children aged 8 to 10 were "starting to feel happy" when others liked their posts.

Sentence.sentence: For example, these robots will be able to distinguish when someone is happy or sad.

Sentence.sentence: Harvold said, "I was happy that no one else was hurt, but I hoped that the driver would survive."

Sentence.sentence: It meant a happy and loving family.

Sentence.sentence: Jim has retired, but he still remembers the happy time spent with his students.

Sentence.sentence: Lee was very happy to see his mother taken good care of at home.

Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Seeing something attractive seems to cause happy thinking.

Sentence.sentence: Volunteering can not only improve your community's status, it could make you happier.

Sentence.sentence: You helped those people, I noticed, and you seemed so happy.

Sentence.sentence: Rather than concluding that children make parents either happy or miserable, Senior suggests we need to redefine happiness: instead of thinking of it as something that can be measured by moment-to-moment joy, we should consider being happy as a past-tense condition.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But it’s interesting to wonder if the images we see every week of stress-free, happiness-enhancing parenthood aren’t in some small, subconscious way contributing to our own dissatisfactions with the actual experience, in the same way that a small part of us hoped getting “ the Rachel” might make us look just a little bit like Jennifer Aniston.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: According to several studies concluding that parents are less happy than childless couples, single parents are the least happy of all.

Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Readers of Happy Money are clearly a privileged lot, anxious about fulfillment, not hunger.

means.word_mean: 感到（或显得）幸福的, 愉快的, 高兴的,快乐的

sentences.en: We had a happy reunion after many years.
sentences.cn: 我们在分别多年之后又愉快地团聚在一起。

sentences.en: She was happy sitting among her students.
sentences.cn: 她坐在学生中间很高兴。

sentences.en: I am so happy that you could visit us.
sentences.cn: 你能来看望我们, 我真高兴。

means.word_mean: 对…感到满意的, 放心的; 认为…是对的[好的]

sentences.en: Are you happy with his work?
sentences.cn: 你对他的工作满意吗?

means.word_mean: 乐意的, 没有困难的; 情愿, 乐意（做某事）

sentences.en: He is happy in doing good.
sentences.cn: 他乐于行善。

sentences.en: We'll be happy to help if you need us.
sentences.cn: 如果你需要的话, 我们将乐意帮助。

means.word_mean: 给予（或带来）快乐的；使人高兴的；幸福的
（表示祝愿，如 Happy Birthday 生日快乐、Happy New Year 新年好等）
言语、思想或行为合适的；恰当的

jx.jx_en_mean: a place where success or enjoyment is obtained

entry.def: Someone who is happy has feelings of pleasure, usually because something nice has happened or because they feel satisfied with their life.

example.ex: Marina was a confident, happy child...
example.tran: 玛丽娜是个自信、快乐的孩子。

example.ex: I'm just happy to be back running...
example.tran: 我很高兴能重新回到跑道上。

entry.def: A happy time, place, or relationship is full of happy feelings and pleasant experiences, or has an atmosphere in which people feel happy.
entry.tran: （时光、地点或关系）令人愉快的，幸福的

example.ex: Except for her illnesses, she had had a particularly happy childhood...
example.tran: 除了体弱多病外，她的童年特别幸福。

example.ex: It had always been a happy place...
example.tran: 这里从前一直是个令人愉快的地方。

entry.def: If you are happy about a situation or arrangement, you are satisfied with it, for example because you think that something is being done in the right way.
entry.tran: （对情况或安排）满意的，放心的

example.ex: If you are not happy about a repair, go back and complain...
example.tran: 如果你对修理效果不满意，可以再找他们投诉。

example.ex: He's happy that I deal with it myself...
example.tran: 我自己把事情解决了，对此他很满意。

entry.def: If you say you are happy to do something, you mean that you are very willing to do it.

example.ex: I'll be happy to answer any questions if there are any...
example.tran: 如果有问题，我很乐意回答。

example.ex: That's a risk I'm happy to take.

entry.def: Happy is used in greetings and other conventional expressions to say that you hope someone will enjoy a special occasion.
A happy coincidence is one that results in something pleasant or helpful happening.

example.ex: By happy coincidence, Robert met Richard and Julia and discovered they were experiencing similar problems.
example.tran: 幸运的是，罗伯特碰巧遇到了理查德和朱莉娅，发现原来他们也碰到了类似的问题。

means.word_mean: 1. enjoying or showing or marked by joy or pleasure or good fortune;

sentences.sentence: "spent many happy days on the beach"
"quite happy to let things go on as they are"

means.word_mean: 5. exaggerated feeling of well-being or elation
6. well expressed and to the point;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'lucky'): from the noun hap + -y

快乐的
巧妙的
〈口〉有点醉意的
[人名] 哈皮

sentences.cn: 寻找真正的幸福
sentences.en: [不可数名词]to find true happiness

sentences.cn: 那样的措辞并不是十分恰当。
sentences.en: That wasn't the happiest choice of words.

sentences.cn: 他运气真好，从来不用为金钱操心。
sentences.en: He is in the happy position of never having to worry about money.

sentences.cn: 碰巧运气好，我们刚好同时到达。
sentences.en: By a happy coincidence , we arrived at exactly the same time.

sentences.cn: 他巴不得和我们一起来。
sentences.en: He will be more than happy to come with us.

sentences.cn: 我愿意把它留到明天再做。
sentences.en: I'm happy to leave it till tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 她对于自己的表现还算满意。

sentences.cn: 我对他这学期的表现不满意。
sentences.en: I'm not happy with his work this term.

sentences.cn: 你如果有什么不满意的，来说一声。
sentences.en: If there's anything you're not happy about, come and ask.

sentences.cn: 你对这一安排感到满意吗？
sentences.en: Are you happy with that arrangement?

sentences.cn: 那是我一生中最幸福的一段时光。

sentences.en: I'm just happy to be back running...

sentences.cn: 玛丽娜是个自信、快乐的孩子。
sentences.en: Marina was a confident, happy child...

sentences.en: Her eyes shone with happiness.

sentences.cn: 那是我一生中最幸福的一段时光。
sentences.en: Those were the happiest days of my life.

sentences.cn: 幸福的婚姻 / 回忆 / 童年
sentences.en: a happy marriage/memory/childhood

sentences.cn: 幸福的人工作状态也会有所不同。
sentences.en: Happy people work differently.

sentences.cn: 公司似乎会在大多数人相对幸福的地方投资更多，而非人们的幸福感不均衡的地方
sentences.en: Firms seem to invest more in places where most people are relatively happy, rather than in places with happiness inequality.

sentences.cn: Soupios 表示，遵循这十条以古老智慧为基础的黄金法则，我们就可以得到指引，走上美好生活之路，在这条路上，我们不再是旁观者，而是过着更加幸福的生活的参与者。
sentences.en: Soupios  say  following  the  10  Golden  Rules  based  on  ancient  wisdom  can  guide  us  to  the  path  of  the  good  life  where  we  stop  living  as  onlookers  and  become  engaged  and  happier  human beings.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 幸福的婚姻在于妻子提供好气候, 丈夫提供好风景.
sentences.en: In a happy marriage it is the wife who provides the climate, the husband the landscape.

sentences.cn: 记得年轻时所作蠢事的人是幸福的.
sentences.en: Happy is he who knows his follies in his youth.

sentences.cn: 婚外孕出生的孩子大多没有幸福的童年.
sentences.en: Generally speaking, illegitimate children don't have happy childhoods.

sentences.cn: 回想起来, 那是她一生最幸福的日子.
sentences.en: It was , in retrospect, the happiest day of her life.

sentences.cn: 我们是幸福的, 因为我们能做的选择题只有爱彼此或者更爱彼此!
sentences.en: We are happy, as we can only choose loving or loving more!

sentences.cn: 我们过着幸福的生活.
sentences.en: We are leading a happy life.

sentences.cn: 如果你不能成为我妻, 那就让我做你自豪而幸福的奴隶.
sentences.en: If you can never be mine, still let me be your proud and happy slave.

sentences.cn: 是不是幸福的人更多吸引了老师的注意?
sentences.en: Do happy folks elicit greater attention from their teachers?

sentences.cn: 呵, 幸福的树木!
sentences.en: Ah, happy , happy boughs!

sentences.cn: 孩子们的脸上充溢着幸福的笑容.
sentences.en: The children's faces beamed with happy smiles.

sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。
sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.

sentences.cn: 说没有历史的民族是幸福的民族,这是卑劣的谎言.
sentences.en: It is a base untruth to say that happy is the nation that has no history.

sentences.en: Happy is he who devotes himself to the cause of communism.

sentences.cn: 解放后,他父母过着幸福的生活.
sentences.en: After liberation his parents led a happy life.

sentences.cn: 七岁的PETE是 个幸福的孩子, 家庭带给他的幸福的感觉.
sentences.en: At seven, he was a happy soul, a joy to have in the family.

sentences.cn: 这幸福的一对就要去度蜜月了.
sentences.en: The happy pair are leaving for their honeymoon.

sentences.cn: 她眼里噙着幸福的泪水.
sentences.en: Happy tears have gathered in her eyes.

sentences.cn: 所有婚姻都是幸福的. 只是婚后一起生活才有麻烦.
sentences.en: All marriages are happy. It's the living together afterwards that causes the trouble.

sentences.cn: 我在一个幸福的家庭里, 有爱我的爸爸妈妈, 我也爱他们.
sentences.en: I am a happy family, love my Mom and Dad, I love them.

sentences.cn: 开始骄傲地抬头望着天边去仰望下一个幸福的微笑.

sentences.en: Children need a happy home environment.

sentences.cn: 安静的看他们幸福的生活, 一个人品尝孤独, 然后给他安慰.
sentences.en: A quiet look at their happy life, a taste loneliness, and give him comfort.

sentences.cn: 嗯，这项调查是由一家人力资源咨询公司完成的，这家公司共采访了一千多名职工，列出了让人们在工作中感到快乐的前10 个因素。

Sentence.sentence: What, then, are the effects of thinking about time in these different ways? Does one make us more productive? Better at the tasks at hand? Happier? In experiments conducted by Tamar Avnet and Anne-Laure Sellier, they had participants organize different activities—from project planning, holiday shopping, to yoga—by time or to-do list to measure how they performed under clock time vs task time.
